title: Pinky’s How Too
description: See how Pinky do! Learn new things with episodes like How 2 Tie Showz, How 2 Escape Quicksand, How 2 Give Thumbs Ups, How 2 Friendship, and more.
alt1: Pinky wrapped up in a shoelace dangling from the top of his cage and giving a thumbs up
alt2: Pinky sinking in quicksand and giving a thumbs up
alt3: Pink superimposed over a space background with ice cream and pig stickers and tex that says “Got to get my friend back”
alt4: Pinky drumming with matchsticks while laser lights flash and cutout stickers adorn the screen
